contents.content: UNIT 02 面试话题 Interview Topics
杰克在向面试官比尔先生询问福利待遇情况。

contents.title: 比尔：杰克，现在你应该已经大致了解我们公司的情况了。
contents.answer: Jack, you should have known in general the situation of our company now.

contents.title: 杰克：是的，我对你们公司很满意。
contents.answer: Yes, and I am very satisfi ed with it.

contents.title: 比尔：你还有什么问题吗？
contents.answer: Do you have any other questions?

contents.title: 杰克：您能给我说一下公司的福利待遇情况吗？
contents.answer: Would you please tell me about fringe benefi ts of the company?

contents.content: 面试时，除了一般的工资待遇外，我们还需要了解公司的福利待遇，比如奖金、福利、社会保险之类的。

contents.title: 比尔：好的。在转正之后，公司会为员工缴纳保险。
contents.answer: OK, we will pay insurances for employees after the probationary period.

contents.title: 杰克：都包括哪些呢？
contents.answer: What do they include?

contents.title: 比尔：包括养老保险、医疗保险、失业保险、工伤保险以及生育保险。
contents.answer: Include endowment insurance, medical insurance, unemployment insurance, work-related injury insurance and maternity insurance.

contents.title: 杰克：听起来很不错。
contents.answer: That sounds great.

contents.title: 比尔：员工也会有住房公积金。
contents.answer: Employees will also have housing payment reserve funds.

contents.title: 杰克：你们公司的福利待遇非常优厚，能够提供五险一金真是太好了。
contents.answer: The fringe benefi ts in your company are excellent, and it's generous of you to offer fi ve insurances and one fund.

contents.content: 一般企业都会给员工缴纳各项保险，如养老保险、失业保险、工伤保险、医疗保险和生育保险。其中的养老保险、失业保险和医疗保险由企业和个人分别按比例缴纳，而工伤保险和生育保险则完全由企业缴纳。

contents.title: 比尔：你还有其他问题吗？
contents.answer: Do you have other questions?

contents.title: 杰克：我想知道每年员工是否有假期。
contents.answer: I want to know if the staff can get a vacation every year.

contents.title: 比尔：正式员工每年都可以带薪休假一个月。除此之外，员工还可获得免费旅游的机会。
contents.answer: The permanent staff can have a paid month-long vacation every year. Besides, they also get chances of free traveling.

contents.title: 杰克：那挺好的，很感谢您告诉我这些。
contents.answer: That's quite good. Thank you for telling me about those.

contents.content: 如果求职者在面试前可以通过各种途径了解到公司的薪资水平和福利待遇情况固然很好，但是如果不能的话，面试时也要委婉地提出自己对这方面的要求。有时面试官会就这些问题来提问，来考察面试者的情况。此时，一定要沉着冷静，委婉地说出自己的看法和想法。只要做足了准备，以不变应万变，一定能在面试中获胜。

contents.title: 1.除此之外，你可以带薪休假一个月。
contents.answer: Besides, you can have paid leave for one month.

contents.title: 2.我听说贵公司会提供很好的福利。
contents.answer: I heard that your company will offer very good benefi ts.

contents.title: 3.成为正式员工之后，你可以享有公司的所有福利待遇。
contents.answer: You can enjoy all the benefi ts offered by the company after you become a permanent employee.

contents.title: 4.公司为每位员工缴纳保险和住房公积金。
contents.answer: The company pays insurances and house funds for every employee.

contents.title: 5.公司为员工提供国家规定的假期。
contents.answer: The company will provide employees with national holidays.

contents.title: 6.用人单位会为员工缴纳保险费。
contents.answer: The employers will pay the insurance premiums for their employees.

contents.title: 7.一经录用，我们会按国家相关规定为你缴纳保险。
contents.answer: Once you are hired, we will offer you insurances according to the relevant laws of the country.

contents.title: 8.根据劳动法规定，你应该享有社会保险福利。
contents.answer: You should enjoy social insurance benefi ts in accordance with Labor Law.

contents.title: 9.除了保险之外，公司将给你提供免费工作餐。
contents.answer: Except the insurances, the company will provide you with free employee meals.

contents.title: 10.公司提供了很好的福利待遇，如教育，培训，旅游等。
contents.answer: The company offers very good benefi ts, such as education, training, traveling and so on.
